meetingSelection.option: While traveling in the wilderness, the characters fall into a sinkhole that opens beneath their feet, dropping them into the adventure location.
While traveling in the wilderness, the characters notice the entrance to the adventure location.
While traveling on the road, the characters are attcked by monsters that flee into the nearby adventure location.
The characters find a map on a dead body. In addition, to the map setting up the adventure, the character's villain want's the map.
A mysterious item of cruel villain teleports the adventurers to the adventure location.
A strange approcahes the chacters in a tavern and urges them toward the adventure location.
A town or village needs the adventurers to go to the adventure location.
An NPC the characters care about needs them to go to the adventure location.
An NPC the characters must obey orders them to go to the adventure location.
An NPC the characters respect asks them to go to the adventure location.
One night, the characters all dream about entering the adventure location.
A ghost appears and terrorizes a village. Research reveals that us can be put to rest only by entering the adveenture location.

dungeonTypeLocation.option: Catacombs or sewers beneath the city
Beneath or on top of a mesa

nonDungeonTypeLocation.option: Amoung the branches of a large tree
Castle or structure sunken in a swamp
Castle or structure at the bottom of a sinkhole
On a demiplane or in a pcket dimension
In an area devastated by a magical catastrophe
On an island in an underground sea
On the back of a Gargantuan living creature
Sealed inside a magical dome of force
